languages.text: "Касание Той, Что Жаждет обезобразило даже самых малых детей Лилэтан... как глубоко проникла скверна?"

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Вы только посмотрите, тут все к хренам покоррапчено!

languages.text: "The touch of She Who Thirsts has disfigured the Lilaethan down to the smallest of her children... How deep does the corruption run?"
languages.original_text: "Касание Той, Что Жаждет обезобразило даже самых малых детей Лилэтан... как глубоко проникла скверна?"

traits.locale_text: "The touch of She Who Thirsts has disfigured the Lilaethan down to the smallest of her children... How deep does the corruption run?"
"The touch of She Who Thirsts has disfigured the Lilaethan down to the smallest of her children... How deep does the corruption run?"
"The touch of She Who Thirsts has disfigured the Lilaethan down to the smallest of her children... How deep does the corruption run?"
"The touch of She Who Thirsts has disfigured the Lilaethan down to the smallest of her children... How deep does the corruption run?"

languages.text: “饥渴女士的触碰已经扭曲了莉莱赞，就连她最年幼的孩子们都未能幸免……腐化究竟有多深？”
languages.original_text: "The touch of She Who Thirsts has disfigured the Lilaethan down to the smallest of her children... How deep does the corruption run?"

traits.locale_text: “饥渴女士的触碰已经扭曲了莉莱赞，就连她最年幼的孩子们都未能幸免……腐化究竟有多深？”

languages.text: «El toque de la Sedienta ha desfigurado hasta al último de los hijos del Lilaethan... ¿Hasta dónde llega esta corrupción?».
languages.original_text: "The touch of She Who Thirsts has disfigured the Lilaethan down to the smallest of her children... How deep does the corruption run?"

traits.locale_text: «El toque de la Sedienta ha desfigurado hasta al último de los hijos del Lilaethan... ¿Hasta dónde llega esta corrupción?».

languages.text: 「〈かの渇きたる女〉が触れたためにリラエタンは、一番小さな子に至るまで続く醜さを負った…どこまで腐れば気が済むんだ」
languages.original_text: "The touch of She Who Thirsts has disfigured the Lilaethan down to the smallest of her children... How deep does the corruption run?"

traits.locale_text: 「〈かの渇きたる女〉が触れたためにリラエタンは、一番小さな子に至るまで続く醜さを負った…どこまで腐れば気が済むんだ」

languages.text: "Die Berührung durch Sie, die dürstet, hat die Lileath bis zu den kleinsten ihrer Kinder entstellt ... Wie tief reicht die Verderbtheit?"
languages.original_text: "The touch of She Who Thirsts has disfigured the Lilaethan down to the smallest of her children... How deep does the corruption run?"

traits.locale_text: "Die Berührung durch Sie, die dürstet, hat die Lileath bis zu den kleinsten ihrer Kinder entstellt ... Wie tief reicht die Verderbtheit?"

languages.text: « L'influence de l'Assoiffée a dénaturé la lilaethan, jusqu'aux plus petits de ses enfants... La corruption doit être ancrée très profondément. »
languages.original_text: "The touch of She Who Thirsts has disfigured the Lilaethan down to the smallest of her children... How deep does the corruption run?"

traits.locale_text: « L'influence de l'Assoiffée a dénaturé la lilaethan, jusqu'aux plus petits de ses enfants... La corruption doit être ancrée très profondément. »

languages.text: "Susayan'ın dokunuşu, Lilaethan'ın biçimini içindeki en küçük çocuğa kadar bozdu. Bu yozluk daha ne kadar derine iniyor?"
languages.original_text: "The touch of She Who Thirsts has disfigured the Lilaethan down to the smallest of her children... How deep does the corruption run?"

traits.locale_text: "Susayan'ın dokunuşu, Lilaethan'ın biçimini içindeki en küçük çocuğa kadar bozdu. Bu yozluk daha ne kadar derine iniyor?"
